listings.Description of job/activites: During your summer internship you will get a first-hand experience of what a career in marketing with P&G involves, and if it is right for you. You will be working on live business problems, and you will be expected to make relevant contributions to the growth of our brands. Each intern receives a customized learning plan to ensure they get the right levels of coaching, mentoring and formal training as they deliver their work. Responsibilities include working on real and live business challenges, receiving both formal training as well as day-to-day mentoring, and potential for securing a full-time position.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: University undergraduates who will complete their degree between June 2026 - January 2027. UAE Nationals are preferred. Evidence of passion and achievements in academic and/or non-academic activities. Demonstrated leadership skills and analytical capability. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Fluency in English, Arabic is a plus. Passionate about pursuing a career at P&G after graduation.
